definition: someone who pays rent to use land or a building or a car that is owned by someone else, occupy as a tenant
details:
noun
- someone who pays rent to use land or a building or a car that is owned by someone else
= example: someone who pays rent to use land or a building or a car that is owned by someone else
= synonyms: renter
- any occupant who dwells in a place
- a holder of buildings or lands by any kind of title (as ownership or lease)
verb
- occupy as a tenant
